column4: can someone please help me figure out how to get better than 800x600 from the live cd?
hey, does anyone know about screen resolution preferneces?
ok, go to system > preferences > screen resolution
go to pastebin.com, or PM me
I don't see anything wrong with that...
try this: go to a terminal and type "sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf" and then hit Ctrl-W and then Ctrl-T
then delete anything on that line after 1024x768
don't know what to do now :(
